caption.p: Cytotoxic potential of AG-ME against three different cancer cell lines exposed for 24 h at 10-1000 μg/ml concentrations measured by neutral red uptake (NRU) assay: (a) MCF-7 cells, (b) A-549 cells, and (c) HeLa cells. Results are expressed as the mean ± S.D. of three different experiments. ∗ p < 0.05, ∗∗ p < 0.01, and ∗∗∗ p < 0.001 vs. the control.
